description: Cresselia, known as the Lunar Pokémon, is one of the legendary Pokémon that premieres in Pokémon Diamond and Pearl. It is exclusively a female Pokémon but is unable to breed. It has an ornament on its head that resemble a crescent moon, and has three rings on its torso that look similar to the rings of Saturn. Light particles are given off by its veil-like feathers when it flies. Cresselia is a symbol of the dawn, and can stop nightmares, it is said that it is hunting Darkrai every night. When this Pokémon is near, you`ll get wonderful dreams. The Pokémon is encountered on Fullmoon Island after a sailor takes the player to the island, in hopes of obtaining the Lunar Wing to save his son of a nightmare induced by Darkrai. When encountered, it runs to different locations in Sinnoh. As a roaming Legendary, it is set at Level 50.
name: Crecelia
